data.name: Chronicles of Sarval: Bridges of Koni
data.detailed_description:
Chronicles of Sarval: Bridges of Koni is a puzzle game based on graph theory, with beautiful 2D pixel art, immersive soundtrack and a complex narrative with a surprising plot twister.

Solve the puzzles, find the key to the castle and help the wizard Helm in the problem of bridges in the kingdom of Koni

How Does Puzzle Work?

In each level the player must find the path that passes through each bridge only once. The puzzle is based on graph theory, especially in its origin, where mathematician Leonard Euller used graphs to solve the problem of Konisbergh bridges.



The game has 5 distinct regions and more than 30 levels.


In addition to the puzzle challenge, the player also encounters several enemies


A level map purchase system that helps you solve puzzles


And a world full of unique challenges, environments and characters

The game contains

  • More than 30 unique puzzles
  • 5 regions
  • Interactive characters
  • Map purchase system
  • Different types of enemies
  • Immersive soundtrack
  • Beautifuli pixel art
